title: Dolls of many lands
brief_description: Shows dolls exhibited at an international fair and now permanently housed in a famous collection in Italy. The dolls are dressed in folk costumes and are shown in settings which closely resemble some characteristic natural background of the doll’s native land. Suitable for primary school level.
